# gamefabric_volumestores (Data Source)


## Example Usage

```terraform
# Get all volumestores without any filtering.
data "gamefabric_volumestores" "all" {
}
```



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `volumestores` (Attributes List) A list of volumestores. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--volumestores))

<a id="nestedatt--volumestores"></a>
### Nested Schema for `volumestores`

Read-Only:

- `max_volume_size` (String) The maximum volume size supported by the volumestore.
- `name` (String) The unique object name.
- `region` (String) The name of the region the volumestore belongs to.
